title: Hyundai Motor Group unveils its first mass-produced mobility robot platform
description:
Hyundai Motor Group's mobile platform is available in two configurations, adapted to suit various industry needs.

The post Hyundai Motor Group unveils its first mass-produced mobility robot platform appeared first on The Robot Report.
